name: aios-advanced-features
description: AIOS Advanced Features with Chaos Testing, Load Testing, and CI/CD Integration

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:firebase && npm run test:chaos && npm run test:load && npm run test:comprehensive
scripts.build: echo 'Building AIOS Advanced Features...' && echo 'Build completed'
scripts.chaos:start: node -e "const ChaosTestingSystem = require('./server/chaosTestingSystem'); const chaos = new ChaosTestingSystem(); chaos.initialize().then(() => chaos.startChaosTesting('medium'));"
scripts.chaos:stop: node -e "const ChaosTestingSystem = require('./server/chaosTestingSystem'); const chaos = new ChaosTestingSystem(); chaos.stopChaosTesting();"
scripts.load:test: node -e "const LoadTestingSystem = require('./server/loadTestingSystem'); const load = new LoadTestingSystem(); load.initialize().then(() => load.startLoadTest('linearRamp'));"
scripts.deploy:staging: echo 'Deploying to staging...' && echo 'Staging deployment completed'
scripts.deploy:production: echo 'Deploying to production...' && echo 'Production deployment completed'
scripts.health:check: node -e "const AIOSAPIServer = require('./server/aiosAPIServer'); const server = new AIOSAPIServer(); server.initialize().then(() => console.log('Health check passed'));"
scripts.metrics:export: node -e "const AdvancedLoggingSystem = require('./server/advancedLoggingSystem'); const logging = new AdvancedLoggingSystem(); logging.initialize().then(() => logging.exportLogs());"
scripts.agents:discover: node -e "const AgentAutoDiscovery = require('./server/agentAutoDiscovery'); const discovery = new AgentAutoDiscovery(); discovery.initialize().then(() => console.log('Agent discovery completed'));"
scripts.dashboard:start: node -e "const AgentDashboard = require('./server/agentDashboard'); const dashboard = new AgentDashboard(); dashboard.initialize().then(() => console.log('Dashboard started'));"
scripts.lifecycle:status: node -e "const AgentLifecycleManager = require('./server/agentLifecycleManager'); const lifecycle = new AgentLifecycleManager(); lifecycle.initialize().then(() => console.log('Lifecycle status checked'));"
scripts.automation:start: node -e "const FullAutomationSystem = require('./server/fullAutomationSystem'); const automation = new FullAutomationSystem(); automation.initialize().then(() => console.log('Automation system started'));"
scripts.growth:monitor: node -e "const SmartGrowthManager = require('./server/smartGrowthManager'); const growth = new SmartGrowthManager(); growth.initialize().then(() => console.log('Growth monitoring started'));"
scripts.analytics:check: node -e "const PredictiveAnalytics = require('./server/predictiveAnalytics'); const analytics = new PredictiveAnalytics(); analytics.initialize().then(() => console.log('Analytics check completed'));"
scripts.resources:monitor: node -e "const IntelligentResourceManager = require('./server/intelligentResourceManager'); const resources = new IntelligentResourceManager(); resources.initialize().then(() => console.log('Resource monitoring started'));"
scripts.scaling:status: node -e "const AutomatedDeploymentManager = require('./server/automatedDeploymentManager'); const deployment = new AutomatedDeploymentManager(); deployment.initialize().then(() => console.log('Scaling status checked'));"
scripts.monitoring:start: node -e "const SelfMonitoringSystem = require('./server/selfMonitoringSystem'); const monitoring = new SelfMonitoringSystem(); monitoring.initialize().then(() => console.log('Monitoring started'));"
scripts.metrics:view: node -e "const MetricsCollector = require('./server/metricsCollector'); const metrics = new MetricsCollector(); metrics.initialize().then(() => console.log('Metrics view started'));"
scripts.automation:export: node -e "const AutomationExporter = require('./server/automationExporter'); const exporter = new AutomationExporter(); exporter.initialize().then(() => console.log('Automation data exported'));"

author: AIOS Team
